name: neomall-fullstack-ecommerce
description: A modern full-stack e-commerce platform with multi-role support

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.install-all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.setup: npm run install-all && echo 'Setup complete! Run npm run dev to start both servers.'

author: Le Duc Trung, Nguyen Huy Anh, Nguyen Pham Tien Hai, Nguyen Thach Khanh Dzi
